column4: Hey guys, I'm fairly new to linux, but have picked up a lot in the past day or so, I've beat the GTS8800 Blackscreen problem, I've got nvidia drivers working great, beryl is installed and looks awesome, nexuiz runs flawlessly, but I have a few questions....
I can't seem to get my center button on my mouse to work, its a G5 Rev.2, or any of the side buttons for that matter
it's been so long since i've seen an actual 3button mouse.  is yours used to scroll?

I dont really need *all* the buttons this mouse has to work, I just want to forward and back side buttons to work, and the center button click to work, it scrolls fine, but I want to centerclick auto scroll
you said it's on a mac G5?
its a logitech G5 rev.2 mouse
I remember seeing something about the mouse config inside of "sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg", might that have something to do with it?
actually, i think it only has one question about whether or not you want to emulate a 3 button mouse with a 2 button device.
I can't remember what I told it, I think i'll run it again and see what I can do
can you open a terminal window?
